description: Create a material purchase order release redemption.
permissions: User must be an admin or a member of the broker or material supplier associated with the redemption.
side_effects: Creates a material purchase order release redemption.
validation_notes: --release is required. Either --ticket-number or --material-transaction is required. If both are provided, the ticket number must match the material transaction ticket number. The release must be approved and can only be redeemed once. The material transaction must match the release material type family, material supplier, and material site.

flags.name: --ticket-number
flags.description: Ticket number. Required unless --material-transaction is provided. Example: --ticket-number T-100

flags.name: --material-transaction
flags.description: Material transaction ID. Required if --ticket-number is omitted. Example: --material-transaction 456
